bug.author: hlums
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The cell that saves training-corpus-cleaned.txt fails with an error saying No such file or directory: '../../data/clean/stsbenchmark/training-corpus-cleaned.txt' <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
Run embedding_trainer.ipynb <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
